public class L1BigStepProofRuleSet

L1BigStepProofRuleSet

public L1BigStepProofRuleSet(L1Language language)
Allocates a new L1BigStepProofRuleSet with the specified language, which is the L1 or a derived language.

Parameters:
language - the language for the proof rule set.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if language is null.
See Also:
L0BigStepProofRuleSet.L0BigStepProofRuleSet(L0Language)
